name: Platform Challenge
description: Platform Challenge was made to challenge even the most experienced players. Can you complete all the challenges?
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7+ Processor: 2 GHz dual-core Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Any Intel Graphics, AMD or nVidia graphics card with latest drivers Storage: 160 MB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7+ Processor: 2 GHz dual-core Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Any Intel Graphics, AMD or nVidia graphics card with latest drivers Storage: 160 MB available space
